articles.content:
OPINION: Welcome back Sir Jim Ratcliffe, good luck with the poisoned chalice of the Americas Cup.
 The British billionaire only needed a brief taste of the action in Auckland 2021 to be convinced th… [+3638 chars]
articles.description: OPINION: Noble knight tangles with Team NZ in a game of self-interest where there is always only one winner.
articles.title: America's Cup: Billionaires can't resist poisoned chalice - Stuff.co.nz
